features: MIRROR SIZE - Set of 12 frameless real glass mirrors, each mirror tile is 10 x 10 inch. Advanced polishing technology makes safe and delicate edges
HIGH-QUALITY - Gym Mirror Tiles are made of HD float glass, frosted edge protects well your hands

DIY FREE DISPLAY - Can be combined as you wish, whatever square, rectangle or in other shapes, to make your home more elegant and warm. Perfect as door mirror, body mirror, Gym mirror, dance mirror and home décor

EASY INSTALLATION - Package coming with powerful double sided foam tape. It can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex paint walls, light-hole tiled wall furniture or wooden doors, but not for wallpaper, blistering wall, ash-falling wall, moistured wall, uneven wall. After fixed, do not move at will
100% SATISFACTION SERVICE - In case any problem or you are not satisfied, please tell us without hesitation, we will try our best to solve your problem

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Jiolong - Our mirror tile line in the Ruomeng collection, which brings customers excellent experience with its excellent quality. In Ruomeng, our goal is to bring customers better home experience and improve the quality of life. We know it's important to feel good about what you buy, so imagine how wonderful it is when you look in our mirror and see yourself at your most beautiful.

HD Imaging Ruomeng mirror was made of high quality float glass which can provide super HD imaging, beautiful, natural and no distortion. Saving Space Package coming with powerful double sided foam tape. It can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex paint walls, light-hole tiled wall furniture or wooden doors. Frosted Edge Frosted mirror edge, not hurting your hand. The edge of frameless mirror is processed through multiple polishing, matte side has a delicate and sleek aesthetic.
Suitable Wall Latex Paint Wall Tiles Wood Door/Wall Smooth Glass
Unsuitable Wall Ash-falling Wall Brick Wall Uneven Surface Wallpaper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm very impressed! GREAT bargain
reviews.reviewText: I have been slowly acquiring more and more mirrors for our home gym, and I'm so happy to have stumbled upon these!I've seen some other products that are less of a true mirror and more of a reflective film, but these are definitely true mirror squares. They're not super thick, but I'm glad because they're lightweight, and I'm not concerned about them pulling away from their adhesive stickers.There are a total of 12 squares, which I stuck all together to make a long mirror. Despite the lines between each pane, it's still totally fine for seeing your form when you're standing square to it (things look more distorted because I took the pictures at an angle).If you're looking to make a mirror wall or wanting to create a big mirrored space in your home gym, I think buying a few packs of these is much more economical than trying to come by a gigantic mirror. It's important to note, though, that they caution against trying to put these on wallpapered surfaces, textured surfaces, or uneven surfaces.When applying these, I came to realize that the wall I stuck them on is actually bowed out a bit, and while the mirrors still stuck, I really had to mash the last one down for a while to get it to hold (the others were no problem at all).The mirrors come with a ton of adhesive squares. Ours are hung up with one in each corner, and a fifth in the middle, but you could do WAY more squares than that if you wanted, since you get so many. Great product for a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable mirrors to dress up the home gym
reviews.reviewText: I'm really happy with these mirrors. They arrived in very secure packaging and I didn't receive any that were chipped, or damaged. They should be easy to install on almost any flat, clean surface. I stuck them to the wall in my home gym and it really made the room feel bigger and added to the brightness of the room as they reflected light from the windows. The versatility of being able to arrange them in any pattern is great, but I stuck with the boring rectangular layout for my room. No complaints and I'm considering purchasing more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love them.. but one corner came chipped
reviews.reviewText: Love being able to design my own mirrorwalls with lightweight squares. I was going to use all of them but one came chipped Otherwise, these are very light weight, smooth and excellent clarity. It came with stickers but I am not likely to use those as I prefer larger surface grip with possible light framing. But the overall quality is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tile Mirrors
reviews.reviewText: These are great for any use you need. I was easily able to put these onto a piece of plywood with the adhesive it comes with, and make my own gym mirror. It holds up and reflects just like any other mirror. I am happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: High Quality, easy to install, and so versatile. I recommend for a world of other uses other than Home Gym, although they work well there too. I was most surprised at the value though. Good Buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Chipped and Broken in Half
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to receive this item however once I received it THREE tiles were chipped from ALL corners and ONE tile was broken in half :(I was super disappointed! It ruined my idea of how I wanted to set it up..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I thought
reviews.reviewText: This tile-square mirror set is nicer than I thought. Neatly and carefully packaged as well. Packaging is crucial to me. Don’t underestimate it and the impact it has with consumers. Each mirror is wrapped and they come with double-sided sticky mounting squares. However, I plan to use mirror holders instead of relying on adhesives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install Mirror Panels
reviews.reviewText: Installation took about 15 minutes but was extremely easy. Hardest part was ensuring it was lined up straight. A few mirrors had minor defects in the corners. Merely a mild cosmetic variance.
